usecases: Participate in recreational activities such as biking, hiking, and courses
hotel Santo Stefano di Sessanio.solutions: Provides accommodation in a meticulously restored medieval hamlet, offering a unique and historic experience for guests. It also features local cuisine, recreational activities, and meeting facilities.

key_features.Architecture: Carefully modernized by local architects while preserving the town's history
key_features.Interior Design: Simple spaces with stone walls, wood ceilings, and fireplaces
key_features.Originals: Emphasis on authenticity and cultural value
key_features.Location: Santo Stefano di Sessanio, Italy - a historic European destination
key_features.Rooms & Suites: 30 guestrooms spread along the narrow, cobblestone streets of the village
